metadata.title: Claura | Content Automation Systems
metadata.description: We build content automation systems that help businesses create, publish, and scale content without the manual work.
metadata.ogDescription: We build content systems that actually work for your business. From creation to publishing to distribution—automated.

howWeWork.title: Getting you results
howWeWork.description: Our three-step process takes you from content chaos to a running system, with clear communication at every stage.

step1.title: Discovery & Assessment
step1.description: We audit your content process and identify where a system can eliminate bottlenecks and manual work.

step2.title: Build & Deploy
step2.description: We design and launch your custom content system—built around how your team already works.

step3.title: Train & Support
step3.description: We train your team to run the system independently and provide ongoing advisory to help you scale.

comparison.title: We're not your typical agency.
comparison.description: We skip the one-off content projects and build systems that keep producing results long after we're done.

otherAgencies.title: Other agencies
otherAgencies.description: Other agencies deliver content pieces. We deliver the system that creates them—on autopilot.

claura.title: Claura
claura.description: At Claura, we build content systems that work from day one, train your team to own them, and stay on as advisors.

caseStudy.title: Content systems that deliver real results.
caseStudy.paragraph1: Hamilton, a growing e-commerce brand, was spending 30+ hours a week creating product descriptions, social posts, and email campaigns manually.
caseStudy.paragraph2: We built a content automation system that generates, schedules, and publishes across all their channels—integrated with their existing tools.
caseStudy.paragraph3: Within 30 days, they saw measurable results.

team.title: You're in experienced hands.
team.description: No layers of management. You work directly with the specialists who understand your business and build your content systems from start to finish.
team.hiringTitle: Want to be part of the team?
team.hiringDescription: We're always looking for talented people who want to help businesses systematize their content and build systems that work.

faq.title: Your questions answered.
faq.description: Everything you need to know about working with us. Still have questions?
faq.descriptionEnd: and we'll walk you through it.

question1.question: Do I need technical knowledge to work with you?
question1.answer: No. We handle all the technical work from start to finish. You just need to share how your content process works, and we take care of the rest.

question2.question: How long does it take to see results?
question2.answer: Most clients have a working content system within 45 days. We focus on quick wins first, then build on that foundation over time.

question3.question: What if the system doesn't work for my business?
question3.answer: We start with a thorough audit of your content workflow to ensure a system makes sense for your specific needs. If something isn't working, we refine it until it does.

question4.question: How much does it cost?
question4.answer: Pricing depends on your needs and scope. After our free assessment, we'll provide a clear proposal with transparent pricing and no hidden fees.

question5.question: What happens after implementation?
question5.answer: We train your team to run the system independently. As your content needs evolve, we stay on as advisors to help you optimize and scale.

cta.title: Turn content chaos into a system, today.
cta.description: Book a free 30-minute assessment and we'll show you exactly where a content system can save you time and scale your output.
cta.formSubtitle: Schedule a free 30-minute call to discover how a content system can replace hours of manual work every week.

metadata.title: Privacy Policy - Claura
metadata.description: Learn how Claura collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a form, book a call, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, company name, and any other information you choose to provide.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the information we collect to:
section2.item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
section2.item2: Respond to your inquiries and communicate with you
section2.item3: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing
section3.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as necessary to provide our services or comply with the law.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

section5.title: 5. Contact Us
section5.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

metadata.title: Terms of Service - Claura
metadata.description: Read the terms and conditions for using Claura's services.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using Claura's services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Services
section2.content: Claura provides content automation systems, content strategy consulting, and related services. The specific scope of services will be outlined in individual agreements with clients.

section3.title: 3. Client Responsibilities
section3.item2: Cooperate with our team during implementation
section3.item3: Maintain the confidentiality of any credentials provided
section3.item4: Use our services in compliance with applicable laws

section4.title: 4. Payment Terms
section4.content: Payment terms will be specified in individual service agreements. All fees are non-refundable unless otherwise stated in writing.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.content: Claura shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of our services.

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.content: For questions about these Terms, contact us at

metadata.title: Accessibility - Claura
metadata.description: Learn about Claura's commitment to web accessibility.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: Claura is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

standards.title: Standards
standards.content: We aim to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible to people with disabilities.

features.title: Features
features.intro: Our website includes the following accessibility features:
features.item6: Resizable text without loss of functionality

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.content: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of our website. If you encounter any accessibility barriers, please contact us at

hamilton.metaTitle: Hamilton Case Study - Claura AI Agency
hamilton.metaDescription: How we helped Hamilton automate their e-commerce operations and save 50+ hours per month.
hamilton.title: Hamilton
hamilton.tagline: From manual chaos to automated growth.
hamilton.heroDescription: Hamilton, a fast-growing e-commerce brand specializing in home goods, was drowning in manual order processing and customer support tasks. We helped them reclaim their time.
hamilton.challengeP1: Hamilton's team was spending over 60 hours a week on repetitive tasks—processing orders, responding to common customer inquiries, and manually updating inventory across multiple platforms.
hamilton.challengeP2: As order volume grew 200% year-over-year, their small team couldn't keep up. Errors were increasing, response times were slipping, and the founders were stuck in operations instead of strategy.
hamilton.solutionP1: We built a custom automation system that connected their Shopify store, customer support inbox, and inventory management into a single intelligent workflow.
hamilton.solutionP2: AI-powered responses handle 70% of customer inquiries automatically, while smart routing ensures complex issues reach the right team member. Orders now flow through processing without manual intervention.
hamilton.resultsP1: Within the first month, Hamilton's team reclaimed over 50 hours of manual work. Order processing time dropped from 15 minutes per order to under 5, and customer response times improved by 80%.
hamilton.resultsP2: The founders can now focus on growth strategy instead of putting out daily operational fires. Revenue has increased 35% since implementation, driven by faster fulfillment and happier customers.
hamilton.testimonialQuote: They didn't overwhelm us with options. They just built exactly what we needed. We're saving 15 hours a week and saw ROI in under two months.

terra.metaTitle: Terra Case Study - Claura AI Agency
terra.metaDescription: How we helped Terra streamline their meal kit operations and reduce waste by 30%.
terra.title: Terra
terra.heroDescription: Terra delivers organic meal kits to health-conscious customers nationwide. We helped them optimize their supply chain and reduce food waste with intelligent automation.
terra.challengeTitle: Too much waste, not enough time.
terra.challengeP1: Terra was losing nearly 20% of their fresh ingredients to waste due to inaccurate demand forecasting. Manual processes for subscription management and delivery scheduling were creating bottlenecks.
terra.challengeP2: Their customer service team was overwhelmed with delivery inquiries, subscription changes, and dietary customization requests—all handled through email and spreadsheets.
terra.solutionP1: We implemented an AI-driven demand forecasting system that analyzes subscription patterns, seasonal trends, and historical data to predict ingredient needs with 95% accuracy.
terra.solutionP2: A self-service portal now lets customers manage subscriptions, customize meals, and track deliveries—reducing support tickets by 60% and giving the team time to focus on product quality.
terra.resultsP1: Food waste dropped from 20% to under 14% within the first quarter. Fulfillment speed improved by 45%, meaning customers receive fresher ingredients and fewer delivery issues.
terra.resultsP2: Subscription retention doubled as customers gained more control over their experience. Terra now serves 3x more customers with the same team size.
terra.testimonialQuote: The demand forecasting alone paid for itself in the first month. We're wasting less food and our customers are happier than ever.

savannah.metaTitle: Savannah Case Study - Claura AI Agency
savannah.metaDescription: How we helped Savannah automate their client reporting and scale their marketing agency.
savannah.title: Savannah
savannah.heroDescription: Savannah is a boutique marketing agency helping small businesses grow online. We automated their most time-consuming tasks so they could focus on creative strategy.
savannah.challengeP1: Savannah's team spent nearly half their week on client reporting, data collection, and campaign setup tasks. Each monthly report took 4-6 hours to compile manually from multiple platforms.
savannah.challengeP2: With only 12 active clients, they were already at capacity. New business opportunities were being turned away because there simply wasn't enough bandwidth for onboarding and delivery.
savannah.solutionP1: We built an automated reporting pipeline that pulls data from Google Analytics, Meta Ads, and email platforms into beautifully formatted client reports—generated in minutes, not hours.
savannah.solutionP2: Campaign setup workflows now handle the repetitive configuration tasks, while AI-assisted content suggestions help the creative team move faster without sacrificing quality.
savannah.resultsP1: Monthly reporting that used to take 4-6 hours per client now takes under 30 minutes of review time. The team reclaimed 20 hours per week across all client accounts.
savannah.resultsP2: Savannah has since onboarded 8 new clients without adding headcount. Revenue grew 40% in the first quarter after implementation, and client satisfaction scores reached an all-time high.
savannah.testimonialQuote: We went from turning away clients to actively growing. The automation freed our team to do what they do best—creative strategy.

snowflake.metaTitle: Snowflake Case Study - Claura AI Agency
snowflake.metaDescription: How we helped Snowflake automate their customer onboarding and reduce churn by 25%.
snowflake.title: Snowflake
snowflake.tagline: Onboarding at scale, retention by design.
snowflake.heroDescription: Snowflake provides project management tools for remote teams. We helped them transform their customer onboarding process and dramatically reduce churn.
snowflake.challengeP1: Snowflake's onboarding process was taking an average of 14 days, with customers requiring 3-4 support calls just to get started. Nearly 30% of new signups churned within the first 60 days.
snowflake.challengeP2: The customer success team was stretched thin, manually walking each new account through setup while simultaneously trying to retain at-risk customers. Important follow-ups were falling through the cracks.
snowflake.solutionP1: We designed an intelligent onboarding flow that adapts to each customer's team size, industry, and use case. Interactive guides, automated check-ins, and contextual help reduced the need for manual support.
snowflake.solutionP2: A predictive churn model now flags at-risk accounts before they disengage, giving the success team time to intervene with personalized outreach and tailored resources.
snowflake.resultsP1: Onboarding time dropped from 14 days to just 4. New customers reach their first value milestone 70% faster, and the number of support calls during onboarding decreased by 80%.
snowflake.resultsP2: Churn dropped 25% within the first quarter. Customer satisfaction scores climbed to 4.8 out of 5, and the success team now proactively manages 3x more accounts.
snowflake.testimonialQuote: Our onboarding used to be our biggest weakness. Now it's our competitive advantage. Customers get value faster and they stay longer.
snowflake.testimonialRole: VP of Customer Success at Snowflake

loop.metaTitle: Loop Case Study - Claura AI Agency
loop.metaDescription: How we built Loop: the platform that generates product photos, e-commerce videos, and Meta ads on autopilot.
loop.title: Loop
loop.tagline: A system that generates, analyzes, and publishes ad creative. By itself.
loop.heroDescription: E-commerce brands were spending thousands every month on photo shoots and video production — and by the time the content was ready, the season had already changed. We built Loop to fix that at the root.
loop.challengeTitle: Producing content at scale was impossible.
loop.challengeP1: An active Meta brand needs 20 to 50 new creatives per month just to avoid ad fatigue. That means hiring photographers, designers, and videographers — and still falling behind the competition.
loop.challengeP2: On top of that, there was no way to know what competitors were doing. Content decisions were made blind, without data, and ad spend was optimized manually once a week — often too late.
loop.solutionTitle: Loop: generation, intelligence, and publishing in one place.
loop.solutionP1: We built Loop as an end-to-end platform. From the web, brands generate product photos from multiple angles, Pixar-style 3D renders, and e-commerce videos — no photo shoots, no studios, no waiting. In minutes.
loop.solutionP2: Loop is also integrated with Meta Ad Library to discover and analyze any competitor's ads. An AI agent works 24 hours a day analyzing which creatives are performing, detecting patterns, and generating new content from those recommendations. Everything is automatically published to organic accounts and paid Meta campaigns.
loop.resultsP1: Brands using Loop go from producing 5-10 pieces per week to generating 500+ creatives per month — at a production cost 80% lower than a traditional photo shoot. The time previously spent coordinating production is now invested in strategy.
loop.resultsP2: The AI agent closes the loop: it analyzes the performance of every ad, identifies what's working for competitors, and autonomously generates the next batch of content. Marketing teams stop putting out fires and start scaling.
loop.testimonialQuote: Loop completely changed how we think about content. We no longer depend on an agency or photo shoots. We have new creatives every week, and the agent tells us exactly what's working.

spacepal.metaTitle: SpacePal Case Study - Claura AI Agency
spacepal.metaDescription: How we built SpacePal's traffic engine: programmatic SEO, LLM presence, and TikTok multi-accounts driving 50% of total traffic.
spacepal.title: SpacePal
spacepal.tagline: From zero to 50% organic traffic, without spending on ads.
spacepal.heroDescription: SpacePal is the marketplace for renting premium event spaces. The challenge was clear: compete in a word-of-mouth-driven niche and build scalable traffic without relying on paid advertising.
spacepal.tools: Programmatic SEO, Reddit, TikTok, Email, WhatsApp
spacepal.challengeTitle: Visibility in a competitive niche, without unlimited budget.
spacepal.challengeP1: Event space marketplaces have historically relied on word of mouth. Paid traffic in this niche is expensive and hard to scale. SpacePal needed to build an organic traffic engine that could work without a constant advertising budget.
spacepal.challengeP2: On top of that, emerging channels like LLMs (ChatGPT, Perplexity) were capturing more and more high-intent searches — and no competitor was positioned there yet. It was a window of opportunity that needed to be seized before it closed.
spacepal.solutionTitle: Programmatic SEO, LLMs, and TikTok: three engines running in parallel.
spacepal.solutionP1: We built a programmatic SEO system that automatically generates and updates landing pages for every city, space type, and event type. Pages were scraped weekly to incorporate ranking changes and market updates — covering everything from photography studios in Buenos Aires to event halls in Mendoza.
spacepal.solutionP2: In parallel, we executed an LLM presence strategy: identified the most frequently asked questions in the niche on Reddit, engaged in key threads, and built topical authority so SpacePal would appear in ChatGPT and Perplexity answers. This was complemented by TikTok multi-accounts in carousel format — tips on event organization, how to find venues, location management — organically and indirectly redirecting audience to the platform.
spacepal.resultsP1: 50% of SpacePal's total traffic today comes from SEO. The programmatic landing pages cover dozens of cities and categories, attracting high-intent traffic at the exact moment of decision. Content updates itself, with no manual intervention.
spacepal.resultsP2: SpacePal appears in LLM responses for key niche queries — a distribution channel that most competitors still ignore. The multi-channel TikTok generates cold audiences that convert into direct traffic weeks later, closing the funnel organically.
spacepal.testimonialQuote: We had the product. The problem was nobody could find us. Today 50% of traffic arrives on its own, without us doing anything. The system works while we sleep.

metadata.title: Cookie Policy - Claura
metadata.description: Learn about how Claura uses cookies on our website.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and allow certain features to work.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.intro: We use cookies for the following purposes:
howWeUse.essential: Essential cookies: Required for the website to function properly
howWeUse.analytics: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
howWeUse.preference: Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit our site.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at
